sentences.en: B : The guy who made the talisman?
Being stubborn, however, he clung to the hat as to a talisman.
sentences.cn: 但这人很固执, 把这呢帽当宝贝一般坚持戴着.

sentences.en: But , as he bid his talisman farewell, Benitez offered a note of caution.
sentences.cn: 但是相对于他的友好, 贝尼特斯却给了他个警告.

sentences.en: Dress was the one unfailing talisman and charm used for keeping all things in their places.
sentences.cn: 服饰是百试不爽的灵符和神咒,可以维持一切事物的现有秩序.

sentences.en: Dress was the one unfailling talisman and charm used for keeping all things in their places.
sentences.cn: 衣冠是当作保持品位和秩序的一种万应灵符.

sentences.en: I am their lucky talisman; my business has never been so good.
sentences.cn: 我是他们命运保护神, 我的生意从来也没这么好过.

sentences.en: In order to impress the audience deeply, every moderator has his own talisman.
sentences.cn: 为了深深地打动观众, 每位调解人有他自己的护符.

sentences.en: It was like a talisman worn in bosom.
sentences.cn: 它就象佩在胸前的护身符一样.

sentences.en: Quick as a wink , the lamemouse snatched up the precious talisman.
sentences.cn: 说时迟那时快, 跛足的老鼠一把抓住宝贵的法宝.

sentences.en: Talisman : The tailisman who can drive the entireteam forward.
sentences.cn: 中场指挥官-善于全面控制球场.

sentences.en: Talisman, Talisman, show me your secrets.
sentences.cn: 护身符, 护身符, 请把玄机告诉我.

sentences.en: The ancients believed that a talisman written in red was doubly powerful.
sentences.cn: 对于出生属于巨蟹座、双子座或室女座的人来说,白色是特别吉祥的颜色.

sentences.en: The talisman consists of two circles with triangles drawn on them.
sentences.cn: 这种护身符由两个圆圈组成,圆圈上画有三角.

sentences.en: This talisman can block off disasters , and evil things.
sentences.cn: 这张画符可以用来消灾免难.

trans.tran_cn: 护身符，驱邪物，有不可思议的力量之物，法宝
trans.tran_en: an object that is believed to have magic powers to protect the person who owns it
